name: Semi-Fungible Tokens (ERC-1155)
description: Tokens that transition from fungible to non-fungible. Efficient for items with limited editions.
when_to_use: Event tickets, limited editions, gaming items with quantities
benefits: Flexible tokenomics, gas-efficient, combines fungible and NFT properties
drawbacks: Complex state tracking, less common standard
use_cases: Concert tickets (fungible until used), game items, edition NFTs
